1: Grab the green square block B1.
2: Move the green triangle block B1 towards the top left corner.
3: Move the green square block B1 to the top left corner.
4: Move the blue square block B1 towards the top left corner.
5: Move the yellow square block B1 to the top left corner.
6: Move the blue square block B1 towards the top left corner.
7: Release the pink triangle block B1 in the top left corner.
8: Back away from the yellow triangle B1 in the top left corner.
9: Release the green square block B1 in the top left corner.
10: Grab the blue square block B1.
